page.title: 04Cuckmere Community Bus.
page.content: Cuckmere Community Bus service commenced in 1976 with a bus provided by East Sussex County Council. Now 2 buses operate from Berwick Station serving villages in the Cuckmere area on 3 days a week travelling to Hailsham and Seaford over slightly different routes on each day. Representatives from the villages, the County Council and the Southdown Bus Co. are on the organising committee. Some of the original drivers are among the 20 volunteers all holding PSV licences. Arlington and Berwick are amongst the villages served, though the service is available to any member of the public provided they are not conveyed between 2 points on a Southdown route. The service is almost self-supporting but small donations are made annually by most of the parish councils concerned.
